people_also_ask.question: How do you win the spitting contest in Monkey Island 2?
people_also_ask.heading: Use the crazy straw on the green Phlegm and Tonic to drink it. Guybrush will remark that this drink makes his spit thicker. Talk to the Spitmaster again. He will announce your return to the spitting contest.15-Sep-2017
people_also_ask.title: How to Win the Spitting Contest in "Monkey Island 2" - Our ...

people_also_ask.question: How do you get to grog in Monkey Island 2?
people_also_ask.heading: Return to the wharf and enter the jail. Use the Small Key to open the cell door and release the woman. Take the Vanilla Envelope from the shelf and then open it to find a Bottle o' Near-Grog. Leave the jail, walk back to the path and go to the mansion.

knowledge_panel.description: monkey island 2: lechuck's revenge is an adventure game developed and published by lucasarts in 1991. a sequel to 1990's the secret of monkey island, it is the second game in the monkey island series. it was the sixth lucasarts game to use the scumm engine, and the first game to use the imuse sound system. wikipedia
